/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush greenery and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and urban architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding to the overall vibrancy of the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are rich and varied, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
